lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to help other people in need. I heard about this organization before and wanted to become a lender. Thank you for the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computer skills and soft skills (leadership, management, interviewing, etc.) to employees of a health care system. I am a doctoral student and hope to finish in 2009 with a doctorate in education.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help people grow
lender.occupational_info: I work in Space Agency to help people to explore beyond the final frontier . To secure humanity future beyond our earth

lender.name: To honor Louise Siffin
lender.loan_because: In honor of Louise Siffin of Bloomington indiana

lender.name: Carol & Harold Trainer
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to help people in need around the world. Helping people out of poverty will also help to ensure world peace. The important thing to us is to leave the world a better place than we found it and KIVA is one of the ways in which we can do that.
lender.occupational_info: Harold is a retired USAF officer and now teaches college part time. Carol is a USAF veteran and retired Flight Attendant. Both are very active in peace and justice issues through Vietnam Veterans Against the War and Louisville Peace Action Community. We are very family oriented and are happily involved in the lives of our 2 daughters' families and 4 grandchildren.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: Consult, coach, develop leaders to enable effective leadership change.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: A way to make a difference in a life.

lender.name: High Relief
lender.loan_because: I was very fortunate in having a good career and would now like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: It was great fun for 30 yrs. But retirement is fun too !

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can make a real difference to someone.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I hope to make life a little better for those who get these loans
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired environmental engineer and my wife is a retired schoolteacher

lender.name: tangog1rl
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make a bit more difference on a daily basis for people less fortunate

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide economic opportunities for people in need, as an expression of the love of Christ.
lender.occupational_info: Biologist

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm where I am because all sorts of folks believed in me, and helped me when I needed it. I'm just doing the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I organize, document, and improve communications so that the bank's computer software writers, testers, and other technical people can produce the best software product for the bank's needs.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: There is a need.
lender.occupational_info: Go to my photo site to view my work pictures.

lender.name: Julius G.
lender.loan_because: I want to boost my business and it will helps me to reduce poverty/inflation in Nigeria
lender.occupational_info: We are into sales of Communication Devices Such as Laptops,Pda,cameras,electronic,mobile phones and other communication devives

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I wish to be part of something bigger than myself and my own worries...and happiness. It is so small--what I do--but through KIVA is does so much
lender.occupational_info: I am 72 years old, work part-time for a small company that markets for hotels on the Internet. I like what I do very much, and every day can hold new surprises, laughter, worry, all the elements that keep your mind and heart filled

lender.name: Luca and Dushka
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: We highlight good things about companies.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: it gives me a sense of accomplishment and allow others success.
lender.occupational_info: I sell products to the pharmaceutical industry that develop new drugs!

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: I am
lender.occupational_info: I know it's only a little, but I hope it helps!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: God has blessed our family and in turn we want to be a blessing to others!

lender.name: Anna A-B
lender.loan_because: I believe we need /ought to help one another ..I'm grateful to be able to give back...to help people have a better life.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: because everyone deserves a chance at a better life --- empowering women impacts not only their families, their communities and their country, it also determines the quality of life for future generations
lender.occupational_info: my work involves helping people get out of debt

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm impressed by the risk these people take to start and run a business. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I develop web applications and design databases.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good

lender.name: T Family
lender.loan_because: we would like to share our good fortune with others and teach our children that "you get what you give" can be a very fullfilling tenet.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's a good and needful thing to share what we can with our neighbors around the world.

lender.name: Wes and Cathie
lender.loan_because: We have been so very blessed and are excited to be able to give back. Microloans are such a great way to enable those in developing countries to get their businesses up and running and be able to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Krishna
lender.loan_because: I would like see the world a richer place, where hard work is rewarded. A place where anyone can "make it" given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a place where big cardboard boxes are made.

lender.name: Yukihiro
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Akihiro
lender.loan_because: I just want them to stay happy. And Kive has given me a great way to do.
lender.occupational_info: software engineer for car industry.

lender.name: Tranaya
lender.loan_because: A small investment from me can make a huge impact in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I have a private retreat center on the shores of Lake Atitlan, Guatemala. We offer personal retreats and explorations of this beautiful land and the Mayan culture.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I feel this is one of the few ways I can make a difference to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I create jewelry and I teach children

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Redirecting traditionally inequitable streams for resource distribution is a must. Without equal access to financial services, how can we expect all to live a more just and sustainable life? I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of meeting new people and ideas all the time. My job is then to communicate what I learn. I hope to do the same with microfinance and to help facilitate even more investment in this important sector.

lender.name: Susie & Dave
lender.loan_because: Helping is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I design printers that connect to computers

lender.name: shaun
lender.loan_because: I must

lender.name: Mark Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can. My karma is a dark and torn. Their need is greater than mine.
lender.occupational_info: I move music. I do something with computers.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: People with the drive and ambition to start a business deserve a helping hand.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because:
it is a direct way to give others the opportunity to increase the quality of their lives where there are few resources to do so.
"The arguments tend to be circular. People are poor because they are lazy. How do we "know" they are lazy? Because they are poor. Promoters of these interpretations rarely understand that low productivity results not from laziness and lack of effort but from lack of capital inputs to production"
-Jeffrey Sachs
You cant be rich unless you give something back. I dont mean charity, although that is important. The best gift you can give is confidence teaching people to compete on their own.
-Jeffrey Immelt
Why do i keep quoting people named Jeffrey?
lender.occupational_info: Chemical Engineer in the petroleum industry traveling the globe learning about different cultures and the current energy establishment.

lender.name: Asuka
lender.loan_because: I just think it's nicer to spend money to help someone in stead of buying beers ! ( Alchol is wonderful thing though )
lender.occupational_info: Selling filters which reduce pollutant particles from deisel engines.

lender.name: In Memory -Shasta & Cody
lender.loan_because: these two puppies are still doing good deeds

lender.name: Floyd
lender.loan_because: I have.
lender.occupational_info: I help university students with any sort of University related problem

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share His blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my life taking care of my husband, being his companion, and doing whatever work in the church I can find to do.

lender.name: Bryon
lender.loan_because: it provides evidence that dreams are meaningful.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses build people strategies to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Help out other people
lender.occupational_info: I cut meat in the retail market

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I wanted to make a difference by doing more than simply giving a handout to charity. I think Kiva.org has great potential to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I create a reports telling clients how good or how bad their financial investments are performing.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's approach to changing lives. What little bit i can contribute helps in ways that I could never see if I gave to a big non profit
lender.occupational_info: An executive recruiter is hired by companies to find people to work in their business. Once the companies hire me, I need to call many people to see if they want the job I have been hired to fill.

lender.name: Marius
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva helps me connect with hardworking and responsible people who wants to take charge of their own destiny, which also will provide an economic basis for the healthy development of their countries.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: How could I not loan money to a person with the desire and initative to better themselves

lender.name: Willy
lender.loan_because: This money has a positive impact on the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital as a imaging technologist.

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: I believe that even a little change can make a lot of difference.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel better about my own chocolate addiction.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate in my life and God has watched over my family. I need to give back and give others the opportunity someone else gave me. It can be hard to get up and dust your self off if no one is there with a lending hand.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit high level executives for business' mainly in the healthcare field. Most of my day consists of phone and computer work. It can be very tedious and boring at times. While at other times it is exhilerating. But, the sense of satisfaction when the task is completed is awesome. I want others to succeed and enjoy what they do.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with many things; family, good friends, health, and enough money. As a Christian, I feel it is my privilege to share what I can with others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I pay the bills of the company I work for, send out invoices, answer the telephone, and lots of other clerical functions. My company installs tile on floors and showers, and granite on countertops.

lender.name: The Okapis
lender.loan_because: We've been lucky in life. We want to support people who are determined to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: vk.
lender.loan_because: It reminds me there's a world outside this 100-mile radius.
lender.occupational_info: "It is sometimes a mistake to climb; it is always a mistake never even to make the attempt. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." - Neil Gaiman, "Sandman: Fear of Falling" (Vertigo Preview Issue)

lender.name: Omar K
lender.loan_because: For those who want to be active and improve their lot, without forgetting that this life is but part of a greater plan.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I had the privilege of conducting a field study on human rights and humanitarian aid in Colombia a few years ago. I found that the most efficient aid, and also the most appreciated by those in need, was micro loans. I believe that anyone can change their life if they're given a chance. So let's give all a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a self employed lawyer using the Internet as my base for client contacts.

lender.name: Pia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Ermine
lender.loan_because: Someone's got to start somewhere!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mechanic. I work on OTR diesel engines, and go to school in my spare time.

lender.name: Family Hglund
lender.loan_because: I herad about it in a Tv program and I liked the ida to help

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am blessed; by the place and time I was born in, the education that I received, my career, my health, the opportunities that I have. We are called to share with those in need. To be stewards of the gifts that we have received. We can do no less.

lender.name: Zinnia's Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people, in less developed countries, build businesses that support their own communities. We want these small businesses to succeed to help the world become more equitable and sustainable. We appreciate getting the opportunity to share.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I admire them who try to do something about the situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work with book-keeping an office of a painting company. At my spare time I love to knit.

lender.name: Uffe
lender.loan_because: Kiva gr det mjligt.

lender.name: CRAIG
lender.loan_because: I know that this type of personal lending works to make individuals independent. Once independent, anything can happen. I cannot fix the world, but perhaps someone I help will. One person at a time is now my mantra.
lender.occupational_info: I no longer work every day. Before retirement I was in banking and law. I continue to help in my community by reading to school children and helping low paid wage earners understand finances.

lender.name: Niclas
lender.loan_because: Because I can! I think equality is important, therefore I only lend money to women
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries and illness

lender.name: III AD
lender.loan_because: We feel fortunate to be able to work in a field that sustains us economically and creatively. We loan/give because we believe in the global community and want to do what we can to foster its growth. Rain feeds your garden one drop at a time, let it pour.
lender.occupational_info: We are a smalll design/build company dedicated to inspired/thoughtful work, carefully crafted and based on green building principles.

lender.name: Karl-Johan
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to recieve funding for my own ventures and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell things on the Internet

lender.name: Per
lender.occupational_info: Im interrested in crafts, history and I like to listen to music. I also enjoy making silver jewelry.

lender.name: Frank and Leslie
lender.loan_because: ?? Isn't that the right thing to do?
lender.occupational_info:
Frank teaches people how to manage emergencies.
Leslie works at home

lender.name: Hkan
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: Because I want and can, its as simple as that.

lender.name: rolle
lender.loan_because: I belive that to give loans like this is a very good way to make people help themselfs.
lender.occupational_info: I drive train, truck and bus in Stockholm and I am also active as a peacekeeping soldier. Have been serving in the ME , Kosovo and recently Tchad

lender.name: Freelanzer
lender.loan_because: It is nice to see the money get to good use. There is great strife in the world today and we must commit ourselves to in unity end this and let humankind arise to a new dawn with no poor.
lender.occupational_info: I own a Tropical-house or Zoo with two others. We have reptiles, insects and spiders on display for the public so they may learn more of the diversity in this world.

lender.name: Alma
lender.loan_because: Compassion for humanity and an ability to provide capital where major lending institutions have failed the developing economies. Kiva has blessed us with being able to fill this gap. People need opportunities to grow their businesses and hopefully build and contribute to their communities.

lender.name: Bengt
lender.loan_because: I am glad for the opportunity to help.

lender.name: Lisen
lender.loan_because: I want to give honest people who struggle the opportunity to help themselves to a better future.
lender.occupational_info: I restore antiquities.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Opportunity for others is important.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others reach financial freedom.

lender.name: Stig
lender.loan_because: I have an income that make it possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am working with computers

lender.name: Cybil
lender.loan_because: I heard about this idea in swedish Tv, and I find it great! I love to be a Kiva-lender. We who have much can help.
lender.occupational_info: Take care of my family and all people that want my help.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving people access to capital, normally denied to them, can improve their lives and the lives of their families and people in their communities

lender.name: Rod & Sheila
lender.loan_because: We have been to desperately poor countries and have come to realize that part of the reason we are blessed, is so we can be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: Sheila teaches English in her home and Rod operates heavy equipment for Highland Valley Copper near Kamloops, BC.

lender.name: Kristan
lender.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to leave this world a little better than we found it.
lender.occupational_info: I am pursuing a Master of Social Work degree.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: Microlending -- and people helping people -- makes a lot of sense.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees understand and support my corporation's goals.

lender.name: gunilla
lender.loan_because: I used to live in Bolivia. Once had a son from there. Feel part of the people there.
lender.occupational_info: Work with refugees in my country, teaching them Swedish, to enable them to live here.

lender.name: Cheryl & Dennis
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Luong
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Many small contributions around the world can make large results.

lender.name: Bob & Cindy
lender.loan_because: We have a wonderfully blessed life and like to see others work hard, follow dreams and prosper.

lender.name: Dudley Family
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help those who want to make their families lives better. You gotta share the wealth!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of the Colorado Army National Guard.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: mighty oaks grow from small seeds.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that publishes books for children.

lender.name: Cinquex
lender.loan_because: The world's superpowers' quest for a New World Order and Hegemony must be challenged by all means necessary.
lender.occupational_info: A job is just a means to an end. It does not define who you are.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two young children.

lender.name: Allen Family
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to do what we can to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know much can be done with a little help at the right time in the right place

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with university students every day helping them to see that the true quality of their lives is dependent on how they utilize and share their resources.

lender.name: SAS 1975
lender.whereabouts: Deep in the heart of TX

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I want to be invloved with people on a global level. I want to be involved in other cultures and peoples that are different than my own to help them grow as a business person as I grow as a human being.

lender.name: Rohan
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do to help my fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the intake and distribution of documents between the owner, contractors, architect and the project manager of the construction project for which I am the office engineer. Additionally, I am responsible for compiling a monthly report for the owner which captures the relevant data-sets for the project in question.

lender.name: Trevor & Aimee & Zeke
lender.occupational_info: Mostly, our work is to teach and to play.

lender.name: Laura John Julia Aimee
lender.loan_because: It's really, really important.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, human resources executive, students

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I wish to feel a part of the whole world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clean, temperature control laboratory hoping to unlock understanding of the process of disease that can then be applied to help others. I am blessed by this opportunity and understand that many others must toil under difficult conditions and circumstances everyday to make their ends meet.

lender.name: Jonathan and Lisa
lender.occupation: Jon: database programmer, Lisa: stay at home mom
lender.loan_because: we want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Jon is a database programmer for a Medicare company. Lisa is staying home to take care of our son, Elliott.

lender.name: Winston
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is always the answer, but Compassion is always my motivation.
lender.occupational_info: I make delicious things to eat for hospital patients and staff.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: i've seen it in action

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My education was funded largely by generosity of others who provided loans and donations. Since I can't afford to give much to charity I decided that loaning would be the best way for me to help others with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research in mathematics in order to hopefully become a math professor at a university.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I want to support the way of life in other countries, so that every child and parent can decide over thier life and future for them selves.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Success for the little guy (or gal) is success for me. I lend for entirely selfish reasons; that is, their achievement helps me.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It will make a difference in the lives of those that receive the loans. That seems so much better than spending the money for dinner at a fancy restaurant.
lender.occupational_info: I drove a cement truck for 39 years in San Francisco, California, U.S. Carrying concrete for houses, tall buildings, bridges, and roads. I'm retired now and enjoying the rest. Good Luck.

lender.name: elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to raised my mini sari-sari store that is why i needed $1,000. payable in 12 months. I have a small store, I sell candies,cigarettes, I make snacks,juices and softdrinks, before I used to have an eatery with the same place but due to the lack of capital, I ended up selling candies, cookies,and cigarettes. but for what I am selling is not enough to cover the rental fee thats why I have to expand and renovate my place so that it will be attracted to the customers as well. I want to be successful in my business so that I may retire earlier and have more time to spend with my family. hope you can help me
lender.occupational_info: I have a small business and i am also an employee, of a designing firm. married with one baby boy ( 4 months old). I dont quit unless i see my business is already stable.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because:
It is so little money to me but it can mean so much to someone else. It's the least I can do and I think by helping someone build their own business, you are actually helping the whole community, not just one person.
Also, I grew up quite poor by American standards, and I understand the impact that hope can have. All it takes is a few people to believe in you and it can make all the difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a journalism student with a concentration in environmental reporting. I hope to graduate sometime next year, and I'm kicking around the idea of applying to law schools after that.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have the opportunity to become financially independent and credit with a reasonable interest rate is key.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I think it important that women around the world find their self-worth through entrepreneurship. A society is only as good as the strength and stability of its women.
lender.occupational_info: University Professor

lender.name: Colette
lender.loan_because: It is sheer luck that I happened to have been born in a country of wealth and privilege and because I believe that money is unequally (and unjustly) distributed in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I digitize books.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: I love the efficient, internet based system and the idea of helping entrepreneurs in very small businesses . This way I will be able to help many people using the same Dollar again and again over the years. And I will certainly reinvest and increase the lending total on every occasion. I congratulate the KIVA team for this splendid idea. It makes a lot more sense than an anonymus donation from one government to the other.

lender.name: Blixen
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want that workers could skip the banks that instead of generate wellness generates more poor people.....
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop software

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I always had to help myself. With Kiva I can help others to help themselves too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a typical businessman, closing multi billion $ deals in the IT industry. But my origins are in poverty and I am still close to earth. I want everyone to be happy with their work, feeling special and proud.

lender.name: Ninna
lender.loan_because: Its a good way to help people help themselves

lender.name: Dsire
lender.occupation: Software developer and mother of two kids
lender.loan_because: I have what I want, others don't. Shared happiness is twice as much happiness.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.occupational_info: Playing classical music.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupation: foot reflex therapy, chiropody, teacher chiropody

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: i have a reasonably good and healthy life and want to give back to someone less fortunate than me that has the inspiration but not the money to make a different to their own life or the lives of their family members.
lender.occupational_info: i care. because you do.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: kiva makes it possible to do so in a sensible way
lender.occupational_info: my work involves lending money locally

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
Dear Administrator, Kindly permits me some space in your most high esteem to know my opinion of searching for the NGO'S ON THE NET. I am subsistence farmer who is in need of loan, to help to empower my production. And create employment for my locality, and alleviate myself and my people from poverty. So I would like you to help me out of this or liberate us from poverty. All the best.
Thanks Michael Elkan.
lender.occupational_info: Dear/madam I had completed agricultural secondary school and did not get financial support to continues my educaation, so I choose to start a small scale farming business where I am seeking for NGO's support to loan me to help empower the production. Thanks

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I can. Also want to support anyone who is trying to make a postive difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I report on Television and help people to talk to the media and in front of groups.

lender.name: jschenk
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Clinton
lender.loan_because: it seems like a great way to help.
lender.occupational_info: aspiring attorney.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: What better way is there to feel that you can actually make a difference? It can be frustrating to watch the news and feel powerless to do anything about all of the suffering that goes on in the world. Lending is an empowering act.

lender.name: Linn and Bill
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Bill taught English for many years. Linn teaches elementary age children after school

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: small amounts of money can make such phenomenal improvements in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their money so that they can make their dreams come true.

lender.name: James
lender.occupation: Financial consultant to start up businesses
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the life and teaching of Jesus Christ to help those in need.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I wish all people could have the same opportunities I've had.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together! I enjoy the feeling of connection that making a Kiva loan offers.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: it seems like a good idea

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: i feel it is not my merit to be born in a more wealthy country, and thus i schould share what i have
lender.occupational_info: i work in an office, an hour way awy from my home, and write programs (together with a small team of collegues) of all kinds, mostly things to do administration, for a medium-sized company (about 1000 employees).

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Even the smallest businesses have a tremendous impact.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: I think its the best way to help, giving people the means to help themselves..

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepeneur myself and want to help other women help their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I do the labor for housecleaning and have kept my kids employed when they needed work.

lender.name: CathyJean
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to suceed
lender.occupational_info: I am a visual artist who specializes in works on paper, printmaking

lender.name: Gabriella
lender.loan_because:
Why not?!
I firmly believe that, "to whom much has been given, much will be expected." Since there is such an inequality in the distribution of the world's resources, we must do our part to even the playing field. I subscribe to the mentality that we can "help others to help themselves." The world will never be perfect, but each of us has the power to make it a better place. We are all human beings, after all.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I have the money.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Swedish companies on behalf of the American company IBM.

lender.name: BlackWaveSD
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We sell active sports gear, clothing, and accessories on Ebay.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I love business and because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit employees to work for my employer and I help retain those employees by maintaining a work environment that is fun and supportive.

lender.name: Kyle & Carol
lender.loan_because: Share my good fortune and help others.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I wish the world were more fair.

lender.name: Inga B.
lender.loan_because: Surplus money, even small amounts, should work.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people have a better life.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I wait tables in a local restaurant that serves Italian food. While I'm not working in the restaurant, I work in a glass studio, making jewelry, plates, and stained glass windows.

lender.name: David and Lynne
lender.loan_because: Access to credit is the first step towards creating economically viable businesses. These businesses can then help transform the communities they serve. In the end, everyone benefits as the rising tide lifts all ships!
lender.occupational_info: David is a high school physics teacher. Lynne is a psychiatrist.

lender.name: Thor
lender.loan_because: Even though I live on a limited income, I still have some capability to help others that are serious about their business. I strongly believe that as long as I am capable of helping others achieve their goals, then it is my responsibility to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work. I am considered disabled.

lender.name: Olle
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to help people to improve their life and hopefully make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Install and repair network equipment.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to give everyone an opportunity to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: College student at Georgetown University.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help others.

lender.name: Apryl
lender.loan_because: we are all one and life is meant to be joyful.
lender.occupational_info: My work is teaching people to connect with divinity and to bring that same divinity out in them selves. I believe we all have something wonderful to express. I choose to express through writing, sculpture (www.aprylian.com), and web sites.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: These people want the same for their children as we do for ours. If the small amount I loan can help grow their business, turn a profit, feed, clothe, and educate their children...what's the problem? No Starbucks this week....Oh well!

lender.name: mel
lender.loan_because: The best business people are in the poorest countries - i know this will work
lender.occupational_info: Internet Sales

lender.name: Sven
lender.occupation: Museum curator at Fotevikens Museum, Sweden.

lender.name: Kyle A
lender.loan_because: Because I want other people to feel better.
lender.occupational_info: 6th grader!!!

lender.name: Mac
lender.loan_because: So they may be able to sculpture part of their life.
lender.occupational_info: Bring within the reach of many the art I rediscovered in God's creation.

lender.name: David Mariner
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to build a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working at The DC Center, a gay, lesbian, bi & trans community center in Washington DC.

lender.name: Seattle ML Club
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends, based in Seattle, WA, who are interested in making a difference in developing nations through the act of micro lending.
lender.occupational_info: We are just forming our club and will update this profile once we have our first meeting and pool together our first round of funding.

lender.name: Marie & Philippe
lender.occupation: Happy mother (4 children) and Postal Services.
lender.loan_because: We sponsor two little girls in Ethiopia thanks to World Vision and what they give us in return is indescribable ! Sharing is the only solution for a "better world".
lender.occupational_info: We take part in the network computing project malariacontrol.net. More info: http://malariacontrol.net

lender.name: LeAnthony
lender.loan_because: What makes life worth living if you can not help others.
lender.occupational_info: Help the sick get better.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help other to help themselves.

lender.name: Ramona
lender.loan_because: I'm a lucky bastard... or I believe that people can make there own future. We just need a helping hand sometimes. I'm glad to come along for the ride...

lender.name: Eva Engstrm
lender.loan_because: I can help others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a highly specialized intensive care unit in Sweden. I have also worked in many other places around the world.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I loan because some people are very poor, and I want to help them. I'm glad I can help them.
lender.occupational_info: I work really hard as a student. I am nine years old. My birthday was just yesterday, July 15, 2008. AND I WAS BOrn in 1999. I am a tutor at the public library, and I teach a little girl from Mexico that is five years old and works real hard.

lender.name: Ola
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help somebody

lender.name: SMALLS
lender.loan_because: Cowboy Dogs are interested in loans.
lender.occupational_info: Computers

lender.name: J. R.
lender.loan_because: I am happy, healthy, and I can. Shouldn't you?
lender.occupational_info: I work with the motion picture industry in California.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: we are called to help and support others in need.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Practice what you believe.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies create new data products to serve the construction and industrial industries.

lender.name: Anna
lender.occupational_info: I am dental student. I am learning how to take care of people's teeth.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: it is a good idea
lender.occupational_info: I am a wood and paper scientist who also teaches calculus to students in resource management programs

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: David and Janine
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: We're never going to be rich, but we love what we do and can't imagine doing anything else.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: If we all share a little, it will make a huge difference in the lives of others and the world!

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and I know that these loans do make a difference!

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have the same advantages that I was lucky enough to have.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a doctor, with a focus on international health and development.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a hand up rather than a handout. A hand up communicates respect.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency within USDA which provides 40 different loan and grant programs that supports rural communities and low income families.

lender.name: Andrea & Andy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance...

lender.name: Tracy Jane
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing is an excellent way to create sustainable and ethical economies.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying music therapy. I work in a hospital in the children's physical rehabilitation unit using music to assist their medical and psychological needs.

lender.name: patrice
lender.loan_because: Financial resources need to be made available to individuals, families, and communities that are denied access to basic funds. When social, cultural, political, or envirionmental conditions block opportunities for people to work and build a life, the chasm of separateness gets bigger and our global community weakens.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to motivate them to consistantly consider the well being of people and the planet as they make decisions toward building profit.

lender.name: Werner
lender.loan_because: I am in the very lucky position that I can.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that in some small way I'm helping someone who has not been as fortunate as I have been. I truly believe that these small loans can make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: the idea of someone willing to help themselves deserves respect and support. If all someone needs is a little capital to get started as an entrepreneur then they should be helped.
lender.occupational_info: I work in business development for an Austin based renewal energy company.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help some one less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: Very Busy,working with patients that need glasses,or contacts,and helping the Dr.assist them for all their eye health -needs.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is great to be a part of helping give someone else a chance to make their life better. Thanks Kiva!

lender.name: Shanna
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and responsible for and to each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make the world a better place by advocating peace and justice.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help! Giving others the ability to create their dreams too is very important.
lender.occupational_info: Sort of between jobs - I am leaving doing office work, training to be a massage therapist, as well as a mosaic artist!

lender.name: Jarmen & Ben
lender.loan_because: I should, if I can!

lender.name: lai
lender.loan_because:
I am a lovely girl from China. I owns a small shop selling chinese food and household items. I want to expand the area of my
store and open my new business if i could lend some money. I works very hard from 8am until 23pm everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I am applying for my first loan with Kiva. I am able to improve the appearance of my store and invest in products that increased profits and business. It is hard living as a single girl, but i has no desire to persuade my family and move to a bigger place. Now I needs a loan of $1000 to expand the area of my old store.

lender.name: Anja
lender.loan_because: I believe that is a sufficient way to support people in getting more independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am working for the world largest transport and logistics company as a senior consultant. My main task is to secure intellectual property in any of 220 countries and territories we cover.

lender.name: Vesa
lender.loan_because: It has newer been this easy to change the world. Plus, it's a loan that encourages entrepreneurship and empowerment, instead of a donation that doesn't encourage much anything.

lender.name: rasheed
lender.loan_because: i really love to increase the rate of my trading business.i have plantation of cocoa land.
lender.occupational_info: am a agricultural farmer ,likewise a food trader.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I loan money because I find it fulfilling to give people a chance to get the opportunity to lend money where regular bank loans does not apply.
lender.occupational_info: In my work as project coordinator I help attending in three different project aiming to attract investments to Sweden.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: it's a good idea

lender.name: christine
lender.occupation: I am a environmental education teacher.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Empowerment is key.

lender.name: Brigid
lender.loan_because: I may not have much money, but I have enough to help others.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I realize others need it more than I do.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship can go a long way.

lender.name: Peter & Meghan
lender.loan_because: Every human deserves the opportunity to live out their full potential as creative and dignified individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying socio-economic development from the perspectives of political science and economics.

lender.name: Ami
lender.loan_because: There is an intrinsic desire for people to want to help themselves and not recieve a handout. Pride and appreciation comes from looking at the fruits of your labor, not the dependance on others.
lender.occupational_info: We all come from the same source, thus you are my brothers and sisters. Would you hesitate to help a family member?

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to leave an impact on the world, and this is a very easy way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer applications primarily in the Java language.

lender.name: debra pacheco
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed!
lender.occupational_info: I help raise my granchildren

lender.name: Fam Srstrm
lender.loan_because: we want and hope to help people who have a dream about a new business and life.
lender.occupational_info: We wish you all GOOD LUCK!

lender.name: Allegra
lender.loan_because: I want everyone in the world to have a profitable and rewarding life.
lender.occupational_info: I make educational programs that help children and adults learn to read, or learn to speak and read a new language.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in this program
lender.occupational_info: Retired tax consultant

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant for a financial advisory firm specializing in crisis & distressed credit situations.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are working to make their lives better and who are running businesses that will also support their communities.

lender.name: James Everett
lender.loan_because: Very simply...it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the administration of elections.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I feel I have too much most of the time and really need to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I get to make art for a living.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: the bread of the needy is their life. He that defraudeth him thereof is a man of blood.

lender.name: Amorn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy doing it.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: it beats spending my money on baseball cards and comic books.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising.

lender.name: Volunteer
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer Organization

lender.name: Ola & Linnea
lender.loan_because: The money in the world is unjustly spread. This is a simple way for us to share a little with some other persons that are not as lucky as we are.
lender.occupational_info: Former woodtechnician consult and journalist

lender.name: Freyja
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea! It's smart, helping people build businesses that will sustain them and their families and contribute to a healthy global economy.

lender.name: cecilia
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great idea!

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: We all need to think globally.
lender.occupational_info: I help women deliver healthy babies.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: because I want to help others accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support themselves & their family. I would like to help others because that's what Jesus would do.

lender.name: Amory
lender.loan_because: I care about people and i have visited many third world countries and it has really moved me to lend to them and make thier lives better.
lender.occupational_info: The work of helping people, to any extent, is the greatest gift anyone can give. It can only be repaid by the warmth and contentment you feel from doing good.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Americans have too much money.
lender.occupational_info: I bring food from the kitchen to people in the restaurant while trying to seem professional and like I'm enjoying the act of feeding the super-rich.

lender.name: ADJ
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves to get a chance in life.
lender.occupational_info: I find people in IT the job they want.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals

lender.name: John & Jackie
lender.loan_because: We have always been impressed by the impact that microlending can have. So when Kiva came along and gave us the opportunity to participate it seemed too good to be true.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I care and we're here to help each other
lender.occupational_info: When we are all part of the solution, there won't be a problem.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It's a good feeling to be able to help others

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to come up with money when you are just starting out because not everyone has a good standing with finances. I want to help others out there become financially independant to where they can afford to help someone else in the same situations as what they were once in.
lender.occupational_info: I work with all sorts of different families that want to buy a home but can't qualify due to many different situations that they are faced with. I buy houses and either fix them up and sell them to people on contract or rent to own basis that don't have large sums of money for downpayments or I sell them to other investors that have the financial means to fix up the properties in low income areas to make the communities a better, safer place to live.

lender.name: Davinder
lender.loan_because: I can and we all should!
lender.occupational_info: I help large companies manage their money and ensure that it is spent responsibly!

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to do. I believe everyone should help everyone...

lender.name: Landon
lender.loan_because: I myself have received an enormous amount of help in my life, so I would like to help other people, too.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I help people start home businesses.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: when a person has enough to meet their needs they should share

lender.name: Cece
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to make the quality of someone else's life better.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: Give someone fish and you feed them for a day - Give a fishing net and you feed them for life - Loan them enough capital to start a fishing net manufacturing business, and you might create the chance for an entire community to prosper.

lender.name: Teguh
lender.loan_because: to help refugees in Bitung, North Celebes, Indonesia especially in fisheries,agricultrure and home industry sector
lender.occupational_info: Training them to have entrepreuneur minded and make them more productive, so they can have a better life

lender.name: Nancy Harkrider
lender.loan_because: I car deeply about native peoples, particularly in Southeast Asia
lender.occupational_info: My partner and I design tours for people who want to travel sustainably to Southeast Asia

lender.name: Cait
lender.occupational_info: I do computer work for a nongovernmental organization.

lender.name: Ann and Fintan
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of helping one person at a time achieve specific goals and better his or her life and the surrounding community.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: it's a small thing I can do that makes a tremendous difference to someone on the other side of the world that I'll never meet. I also loan because my partner grew up in difficult circumstances in a Third World Country and it's a way of giving back.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Free enterprise works and everyone should have a fair chance to make it so.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate business processes and try to make them better.

lender.name: Regular Kinda Guy
lender.loan_because: We're a universal brotherhood of regular kinda guys just making a living, caring for our families and neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journeyman pipefitter in a union brotherhood.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to assist minority women to break the cycle of poverty and help them make a positive change in their communities
lender.occupational_info: I style and stage homes so they become show ready and home buyers can move in mentally and therefore make an offer. A staged home generally sell faster and potentially for more. For more info and to see before and after photos of my staging & redesigns, go to www.staged4more.com

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to help people better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an airline and work with the pilots to plan and prepare for their flights.

lender.name: Elaina
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to give back.

lender.name: Blair and Karen
lender.loan_because: We are His beloved!
lender.occupational_info: We help others save on their energy bills and also earn income on energy each month.

lender.name: Vincenzo
lender.loan_because: we can defeat the poverty around the world with just one click.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others to buy their dream home and helping them shopping for the loan that fits their needs.

lender.name: McKell
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade.

lender.name: Moa
lender.loan_because: we are all one

lender.name: Emma
lender.whereabouts: Houghton le Spring Tyne and Wear

lender.name: sofia
lender.loan_because: since i am totally blind myself, and often need help from others, i was happy to find a way of helping my self
lender.occupational_info: music is a way of communicating that works for everybody. The people that i meet as a music therapist have big learning dissabilities and can't use spoken words, but they still have a lot to say and they need to say it. music is good for body and soul and can make you laugh and cry.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because:
Two serious students of Krishnamurti's teachings are looking for other people who would like to join the venture of creating a Krishnamurti Center in India, possibly in Mysore. Anyone who would like to help can contact us.
City: Mysore State: Karnataka Country: India Contact: Ravi Phone: 09980027966 Email: Ravi

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it give others the opportunity to build their businesses which in turn builds their confidence and their happiness. It also makes me feel good. It makes the world a better place to live in.
lender.occupational_info: I fly big planes across big oceans!

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people. I was a VSO volunteer and did a similar thing on a personal basis when I was working in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in a local primary school in Hong Kong.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I love loaning again and again being able to help people all over the world. We are one people, one planet.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare material for print before it goes to press. We do posters, booklets, brochures, business cards, etc. The company I work for (Westcare) is a non-profit organisation that provides work and accommodation services for disabled people.

lender.name: Sherma
lender.loan_because: I admire the courage it takes to start and run one's own business. "If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astonish ourselves." - Thomas A. Edison PURPOSE: If I can help somebody, my living will not be in vain.

lender.name: Lawrence & Family
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics - how to think and reason about buying, selling, and other market activities.

lender.name: Dayngr
lender.occupation: CEO & Founder of eMail Our Military (eMOM)
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help empower people.
lender.occupational_info: We help boost the morale of American service members in need through email, correspondence and care packages.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I just feel that this is the best way to suport a family or a person ,buddha says give to be given
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chef by passion enjoy beeng in asia which is my home now .I share my passion and eductaion by teaching a craft

lender.name: Taryn & Sam
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Emina
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.

lender.name: antonio
lender.loan_because: I care about poor people
lender.occupational_info: As any other hard working Job

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: Empowering women to be sulf-sufficient will change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a public arts conservatory for high school students.

lender.name: Adamson family
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and out of that I want others to be blessed by what we have and what we can give. I love this idea!! It feels great to be doing something so concrete and meaningful and to know I'm helping someone not so different from myself.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom of 3 wonderful kids - Julia (3), Alex and Elijah (twins, 1). I hope that the most important thing I do is to raise caring, compassionate, godly people. I also teach math and science to 12 year olds.

lender.name: Ed J.
lender.loan_because: Backpacked around SE Asia for half a year, and saw lots of poverty and a poor perception of the USA. Since stereotypes break down on the individual level, I think the one to one micro-loans from real individuals in the USA to real individuals in other countries help relations. A citizen of a country is automatically represented by their government on a macro scale, but Kiva gives an opportunity for citizens to represent the better side of themselves to each other one on one.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Julie A.
lender.loan_because: It's a win-win situation. I help someone and my doing so helps them, me and the world.

lender.name: Jack & Lora
lender.loan_because: We want to assist others in their goals to earn decent livings for their families. Kiva is a part of our ongoing charity commitment. As the LORD blesses us, we want to bless others with our resources.

lender.name: Stphanie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great initiative to help people directly.

lender.name: Bill & Annette
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel good and we may very well be judged by how we treat those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Teach art to 1st and 2nd grade students.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: It sounded awesome, and then Jill reminded me about the site again :)

lender.name: Indy Cat-O
lender.loan_because: I am a crazy cat!

lender.name: sierra
lender.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I feel like the disparity between first world and third world countries is immoral.
lender.occupational_info: A lab technician at Columbia University studying metacognition. It's Amazing!

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to feel as though I am a helpful member of the worldwide community. If I can provide someone a chance to prosper through hard work with as little as a $25.00 loan, how can I say no?
lender.occupational_info: I work on transportation systems and public transit projects.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This is one great way to plug in to the global community. It's the right place and the right time to do the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a really cool design/build company, IIIAD (also a Kiva lender) doing what I love, creating beautiful sustainable homes for the best clients in the Twin Cities.

lender.name: Terry & Will
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people help themselves. We believe in the saying "Freely ye received, freely give."

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: we have to help each other in any way we can despite how far from each other we live
lender.occupational_info: I sell tiles for bathrooms,kitchens and also bathtubs ,sinks etc. I also advice people how to build everything from start to finish.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Kylie and Jesse
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are so fortunate in our lives, and love the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to help themselves. We are all neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I create one of a kind collages and paintings.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I like to see the less fortunate members of our world have a chance at realizing their dreams and it just makes me feel good.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I've seen my host mama in Tanzania be able to send both her children to school and improve her home with the loan she received for her brick business.
lender.occupational_info: Graduate student pursuing an MPA.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: My compassion is to help others. I tell my friends all about Kiva and try to spread the word about this great organization.

lender.name: Jim & LJ
lender.loan_because: we want to help people

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for the opportunities I have been given. I want to to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I help small employers set up retirement plans.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to see a change in this world, even if it is only through one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for political campaigns.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have friends and family assist me in starting a business So i wanted to pass that along.
lender.occupational_info: I restore and sell old cars.

lender.name: Will and Edna
lender.loan_because: our dad believed in the Kiva model and was proud to support those who wanted to work to improve their lives. In honor of Mom who passed away 29 Sept. 2007 and Dad who passed away 12 Mar. 2008, we will continue their Kiva account and hope to help lift many others the way our parents worked to lift themselves.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I want to help people!!!!! I have been very blessed and want to pass it on!!!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info:
I am a swimming coach at Penn State University
www.psu.edu www.gopsusports.com
WE ARE.....PENN STATE

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: The amount I'm lending has no impact on my life, but can have a huge impact on someone else's.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Purchasing. My company makes home theater projectors and displays, as well as other flat screen products.

lender.name: Becca
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed. I have food, clothing, shelter, wonderful family and friends. I don't need to struggle to provide for my family the way some others may need to. I loan because my little money may help others succeed in fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help women in childbirth.

lender.name: Kris&Nadia
lender.loan_because: Helping entrepreneurs get started can make the difference

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I love to help out and this is so easy!

lender.name: Jenn, Claire and Dan
lender.loan_because: i loan because to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Zoey & Gracie
lender.loan_because: We raise money every year on Canada Day, with a lemonade stand. This year we sold handmade bead jewelry too. With the money we made there and some matching donations (from some awesome relatives ) we wanted to help some other people in business for themselves. this year for my birthday instead of gifts i asked for donations to kiva on this request i received 110 dollars for kiva.
lender.occupational_info: i am in grade 7

lender.name: Tim and Anne
lender.loan_because: To give someone else an opportunity.

lender.name: DiamondJul
lender.loan_because: it's fun and others deserve the same access to resources I have! It is my way to pay forward the abundance I enjoy!
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional network marketer. I work with people as a leader and trainer in this profession. I help individuals and families create abundance of their own!

lender.name: Chloe
lender.loan_because: giving others the means to help themselves is a wonderful thing.
lender.occupational_info: I look at rocks and soil, I assess their situation and how they behave e.g. landslides and subsidence. I then design solutions to allow projects such as house building, railways and roads. I would be happy to volunteer help to charities who may need my skills.

lender.name: Farah
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student in California.

lender.name: Matteo&Emma
lender.loan_because: Because it' s concrete way to change the world and to help many people. We need to have the same possibilities wherever we born.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a financial analyst in M&A operations.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: to affect the quality of one's day is the highest of arts (thoreau).

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies advertise on major search engines.

lender.name: misty
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: Tera
lender.loan_because: Local economies are the key to a country's success. During our year+ round-the-world trip, my husband and I felt the power of small business on the "feel" of a country.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teachers and school leaders to help students be successful in mathematics.

lender.name: Mike & Nay
lender.loan_because: After watching a documentary about the work Kiva does My wife & I were really keen to get involved with helping others. We are looking forward to seeing many success stories.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because:
I like the idea of helping with money to build a business instead of just giving it away to a charitable whatever where I don't know what happens to it. I hope my money will go around the world many times and help people start their businesses and improve their lives and those of the generations that follow. [Update] My plan seems to work and my moony is helping lots of people again and again. VERY COOL THAT! [Update] Already lent so much! How cool is that. I hope this is making some difference to someone.
Also bought a Yamaha TRX850 and love motorcycles so most of my lending is towards people that use motorcycles or do transport stuff.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the amazing power of free markets, spirited entrepreneurs, and helping others through individual actions.
lender.occupational_info: I work on economic and financial issues facing Arkansas agriculture.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity...pay it forward.
